mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, size, quantity) VALUE (#{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{size}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{id} and product_id = #{product_id} and size = #{size}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{id} and product_id=#{product_id} and size=#{size};
